p: In regards to the flavonoid content, the values obtained are in agreement with the literature for red propolis [ 18, 85, 86]. Righi et al. [ 2] reported a variation of between 27 and 43 mgQE.g -1, while Alencar et al. [ 19], Hatano et al. [ 87] and Wang et al. [ 88] obtained flavonoid concentrations ranging from 43 to 55 mgQE.g -1 when they evaluated different types of propolis.
